    L

    listAllInternships() - Method in class controller.CareerCenterStaffController
    Returns all internships in the system regardless of status or visibility.
    listAllReps() - Method in class controller.CareerCenterStaffController
    Returns all company representatives in the system regardless of approval status.
    listApplications(String, String) - Method in class controller.CompanyRepController
    Lists all applications for a specific internship owned by the company representative.
    listInternships(String) - Method in class controller.CompanyRepController
    Lists all internships owned by the company representative's company.
    listPendingInternships() - Method in class controller.CareerCenterStaffController
    Returns all internships currently awaiting Career Center approval.
    listPendingWithdrawals() - Method in class controller.CareerCenterStaffController
    Returns all withdrawal requests currently pending staff review.
    listUnapprovedReps() - Method in class controller.CareerCenterStaffController
    Returns company representatives pending approval (neither approved nor rejected).
    loadAll(String, String, String, String, String, String) - Method in class controller.DataSaveController
    Loads all repositories from their respective CSV files in the base directory.
    loadFromCsv(String) - Method in class database.CareerCenterStaffRepository
    Loads staff records from a CSV file with flexible header recognition.
    loadFromCsv(String) - Method in class database.CompanyRepRepository
    Loads company representatives from a CSV file with flexible header recognition.
    loadFromCsv(String) - Method in class database.InternshipRepository
    Loads internships from a CSV file and populates the repository.
    loadFromCsv(String) - Method in class database.StudentRepository
    Loads students from a CSV file with flexible header recognition.
    loadFromCsv(String, ApplicationRepository, StudentRepository, CareerCenterStaffRepository) - Method in class database.WithdrawalRequestRepository
    Loads withdrawal requests from a CSV file and resolves references to applications, students, and staff using the provided repositories.
    loadFromCsv(String, StudentRepository, InternshipRepository) - Method in class database.ApplicationRepository
    Loads applications from a CSV file and attaches resolved student and internship references.
    login(String) - Method in class boundary.LoginBoundary
    Alternative login entry point for programmatic or backward compatibility use.
    login(String, String) - Method in class controller.AuthController
    Attempts to authenticate a user by ID or email and returns a role-qualified key on success.
    LoginBoundary - Class in boundary
    Console boundary class handling interactive login flow for all user roles in the Internship Placement Management System.
    LoginBoundary(StudentRepository, CompanyRepRepository, CareerCenterStaffRepository, AuthController) - Constructor for class boundary.LoginBoundary
    Constructs a LoginBoundary with access to all user repositories and authentication services.
    LoginBoundary.Role - Enum Class in boundary
    Enumeration representing the available user roles in the system.
    LoginBoundary.Session - Class in boundary
    Represents an active authenticated session for a single user in the system.
